line_1: TO THEE a Stranger dares address his theme!
line_2: One ray emitted from thy golden gleam,

line_1: To Thee, proud Mistress of Apollo's lyre;
line_2: Prompted by LOVE, wou'd "set the World on fire."

line_1: Prompted by LOVE, wou'd "set the World on fire."
line_2: To Thee, proud Mistress of Apollo's lyre;

line_1: Adorn then LOVE, in fancy-tinctur'd vest,
Camelion like, anon of various hue;
line_2: Such Genius claim'd, when she Idalia drew.
